segments.text: I see the water is just gushing out of the sink, creating a river on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in the middle of it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really straining to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so wobbly, it's a miracle he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing the water just pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will manage to get the cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on her task, it's almost sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees the mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined, I'll give him that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit sad watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
